page.title: 16SHOPPING & TRANSPORT
page.content:
Baumber has a regular bus service that goes to Horncastle . Villagers buy groceries there and also to Louth and Lincoln for clothes and shoes.Hemingby has only two buses per week.There is a small grocery shop and nursery in Hemingby.Most people think that they could surport another shop but some are not sure.Hemingby has a small post office most people use it for allowances and stamps.Lincolnshire County council provides an efficient bus service for school children taking them to Horncastle for secondary shools and to Baumber Primary school.
There are a few mobile shops which some people use these are baker, butcher, fish & chips, clothes & fresh fish. There are a few farmers & keen gardners that sell fruit & vegetables. {Goto page 17.
